title: Ticket #4785: Finish coercion of numbers to booleans in new ClassAds
description: When we added the option in new ClassAds to allow numeric values to be coerced to boolean (i.e. allow 1 || 0), we missed a few spots. Also, we should provide an evaluation method that expects a boolean result and will coerce numeric values to that type. As before, this behavior is disabled by default and will be explicitly enabled by HTCondor programs.
